dct_description_sm: Possibly the work of Robert Morden. Copied by Senex, 1719, for larger map entitled “A new map of America from the latest Observations” (Entry 193).
Issued in his: Cosmography in four books, 7th ed. [London: Printed for E. Brewster, R. Chiswell, B. Tooke, T. Hodgkin and T. Bennet], 1703, before p. 943.
Reissued in: Navigantium atque itinerantium bibliotheca: or a compleat collection of voyages and travels / by John Harris D.D., F.R.S., 1705.

California on second Sanson model, with indented northern coast and few place names. Western coast of North America continues northwest to Falmouth. Includes “The Great Lake of Thongo or Thoya” with 2 rivers flowing to “The Pacifick Sea."
UCB; Margaret Sowers and Stanford; TMC, Winter 1991, p. 2.
